about_the_game:
GAME TRAILER CURRENTLY NOT AVAILABLE

DESCRIPTION:

Gaunts Gambit is a multiplayer first person shooter game. Set in an abandoned school left empty because of a rampant virus, former students sneak back in fighting over control of the grounds and buildings. They fashion makeshift weapons from whatever they can find.

GAMEMODES:

  • 6v6 Deathmatch

  • Battle Royale

  • Zombies

  • FFA

6V6 DEATHMATCH:

Players are divided into two teams of six, where they battle and capture land to earn points for their team. The team with the most points wins the match!

BATTLE ROYALE:

Players fight on a shrinking map, scavenging gear and eliminating others. The last player standing wins!

ZOMBIES:

Players face waves of zombies, barricading entrances to slow them down. Survive as long as possible against the increasing difficulty!

FFA:

Players compete solo in a battle for the highest kill count before the timer runs out. The top scorer wins!

name: Gaunts Gambit | Multiplayer FPS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 6th Gen Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
